title: Amagon: The Book of Man
description: The human race has left mother earth and now lives in vast, utopian Habitats orbiting the Sun. The Habitats are run very efficiently by corporations that tend to all matters human - from sustenance for the body to food for the soul. Amagon is the story of man's ascent into the heavens, and the price that must be paid to live in paradise.
author: A. Umaz
